kv5.3:2.7_0: Hañci kusalaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv5.3:3.1_0: Anicce niccanti vipariyeso, so ca akusaloti?
kv5.3:3.3_0: Pathavīkasiṇaṁ samāpattiṁ samāpannassa viparīte ñāṇaṁ, tañca akusalanti?
kv5.3:3.7_0: asubhe subhanti vipariyeso, so ca akusaloti?
kv5.3:3.9_0: Pathavīkasiṇaṁ samāpattiṁ samāpannassa viparīte ñāṇaṁ, tañca akusalanti?
kv5.3:4.1_0: Pathavīkasiṇaṁ samāpattiṁ samāpannassa viparīte ñāṇaṁ, tañca akusalanti?
kv5.3:4.3_0: Anicce niccanti vipariyeso, so ca kusaloti?
kv5.3:4.5_0: pathavīkasiṇaṁ samāpattiṁ samāpannassa viparīte ñāṇaṁ, tañca akusalanti?
kv5.3:4.9_0: asubhe subhanti vipariyeso, so ca kusaloti?
kv5.3:5.5_0: Hañci arahā pathavīkasiṇaṁ samāpattiṁ samāpajjeyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv5.3:6.1_0: Pathavīkasiṇaṁ samāpattiṁ samāpannassa viparīte ñāṇaṁ, arahā pathavīkasiṇaṁ samāpattiṁ samāpajjeyyāti?
kv5.3:8.3_0: Hañci natthi arahato saññāvipariyeso cittavipariyeso diṭṭhivipariyeso, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv5.3:9.6_0: Tena hi pathavīkasiṇaṁ samāpattiṁ samāpannassa viparīte ñāṇanti.
kv5.3:10.3_0: Nanu pathavī atthi, atthi ca koci pathaviṁ pathavito samāpajjatīti?
kv5.3:10.5_0: Hañci pathavī atthi, atthi ca koci pathaviṁ pathavito samāpajjati, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv5.3:11.1_0: Pathavī atthi, pathaviṁ pathavito samāpajjantassa viparītaṁ hotīti?
kv5.3:11.3_0: Nibbānaṁ atthi, nibbānaṁ nibbānato samāpajjantassa viparītaṁ hotīti?
